overview: Savasagallu is a 1977 Telugu movie released on February 16. Produced by D. Ramanaidu under the banner of Vijaya and Suresh Combines, this movie is directed by Boina Subbarao. Ghattamaneni Krishna, Jayachitra and Prabha are the lead actors for this film, which is composed by JV Raghavulu. [1]
title: Saavasagallu
